translations.chinese: 上令周昌選趙壯士可令將者，白見四人。
translations.english: The emperor commanded Zhou Chang to select Zhao warriors who could be made generals. He presented four men.

translations.chinese: 上嫚罵曰：「豎子能為將 乎！」
translations.english: The emperor insulted them saying: "You bastards can be generals?"
The four were ashamed and all prostrated themselves.
The emperor enfeoffed each with a thousand households and made them generals.

translations.chinese: 左右諫曰：「從入蜀漢，伐楚，賞未遍行，今封此，何功？」
translations.english: His attendants advised: "From entering Shu and Han, attacking Chu, rewards have not been universally distributed. Now enfeoffing these, what merit do they have?"
